rrdworld.name: LPAR2RRD
rrdworld.author: Pavel Hampl
rrdworld.description: LPAR CPU statistics and documentation tool for IBM Power systems servers (pSeries & iSeries) The tool is capable to produce historical CPU utilization graphs of LPARs and shared CPU usage. It also collects complete physical (HW) and logical configuration of all managed systems and their lpars and all changes in their state and configuration
